data.lyric:
[ti:Love Wins]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Love Wins]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Wins - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:14.60]A stray bullet and a momma cries
[00:18.12]Her baby won't be coming home tonight
[00:21.83]Sirens screaming down the avenue
[00:24.97]Just another story on the evening news oh whoa
[00:35.98]Politics and prejudice
[00:39.64]How the hell it'd ever come to this
[00:43.09]When everybody's gotta pick a side
[00:46.60]It don't matter if you're wrong or right no
[00:50.63]And so it goes but I hold onto hope and I won't let go 'cause
[00:57.03]I I believe you and me are sisters and brothers
[01:03.92]And I I believe we're made to be here for each other
[01:11.04]And we'll never fall if we walk hand in hand
[01:14.53]Put a world that seems broken together again
[01:17.94]Yeah I I believe in the end love wins
[01:32.74]Sometimes it takes a lot of faith
[01:36.28]To keep believing there will come a day
[01:39.37]When the tears and the sadness the pain and the hate
[01:43.00]The struggle this madness will all fade away yeah
[01:46.75]I I believe you and me are sisters and brothers
[01:53.76]And I I believe we're made to be here for each other
[02:00.74]And we'll never fall if we walk hand in hand
[02:04.25]Put a world that seems broken together again
[02:07.62]Yeah I I believe in the end love wins
[02:22.62]Love is power love is a smile
[02:25.84]Love reaches out love is the remedy
[02:29.37]Love is the answer love's an open door
[02:32.95]Love is the only thing worth fighting for yeah
[02:40.13]I I believe you and me are sisters and brothers
[02:46.97]And I I believe we're made to be here for each other
[02:54.12]And we'll never fall if we walk hand in hand
[02:57.66]Put a world that seems broken together again
[03:00.99]Yeah I I believe in the end love wins
[03:14.15]Oh yeah love wins
[03:23.43]Love will love can love still love wins
[03:30.48]Love will love can love still love wins
data.trans:
[ti:Love Wins]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:Love Wins]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:14.60]一颗飞出的子弹 让一位母亲流泪不止
[00:18.12]她的儿子今晚回不了家了
[00:21.83]鸣笛声响彻整个街道
[00:24.97]晚间新闻又会有一个新的故事
[00:35.98]政治和偏见
[00:39.64]一切怎么会变成现在这样
[00:43.09]所有人必须选出自己支持的一边
[00:46.60]是非对错都不再重要
[00:50.63]现实如此 但我依然坚守希望 我不会放弃 因为
[00:57.03]我相信我们都是手足同胞
[01:03.92]我相信我们都是为彼此而生
[01:11.04]只要我们携手同行 就不怕跌倒
[01:14.53]将这个支离破碎的世界再次团结起来
[01:17.94]我相信 爱终将战胜一切
[01:32.74]有时 这需要足够的信心
[01:36.28]去相信这一天终会到来
[01:39.37]那时 所有的眼泪 悲伤 痛苦 怨恨
[01:43.00]磨难 疯狂 都会彻底消失
[01:46.75]我相信我们都是手足同胞
[01:53.76]我相信我们都是为彼此而生
[02:00.74]只要我们携手同行 就不怕跌倒
[02:04.25]将这个支离破碎的世界再次团结起来
[02:07.62]我相信 爱终将战胜一切
[02:22.62]爱是力量 爱是微笑
[02:25.84]爱是伸出的援手 爱是治病的良药
[02:29.37]爱是答案 爱是敞开的心门
[02:32.95]爱是唯一值得为之奋斗的东西
[02:40.13]我相信我们都是手足同胞
[02:46.97]我相信我们都是为彼此而生
[02:54.12]只要我们携手同行 就不怕跌倒
[02:57.66]将这个支离破碎的世界再次团结起来
[03:00.99]我相信 爱终将战胜一切
[03:14.15]爱终将战胜一切
[03:23.43]只要有爱 就可以战胜一切
[03:30.48]只要有爱 就可以战胜一切
